title: Sousei Kishi Gaiarth
synopsis: Gaiarth - a world devastated by a cataclysmic war, where pockets of humanity struggle to survive amidst the wreckage of technologies made magical by ignorance.
voices: ['Hidaka, Noriko', 'Ootsuka, Akio', 'Nakamura, Daiki', 'Hyoudou, Mako', 'Tanaka, Nobuo', 'Naya, Rokurou', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Shima, Shunsuke', 'Yoshida, Rihoko', 'Nakata, Kouji']
